movies.title: Cargo
movies.plot: In 2270, Earth is completely depleted and no one lives there anymore. Those that have money move to Rhea; but most of the population lives in orbit in space stations. Dr. Laura Portmann decides to work in the cargo ship Kassandra in an eight year travel to Station 42 that is in orbit of RH278 to raise money to meet her sister Arianne in Rhea. They keep in touch with each other, but their messages take three years to reach the other. Laura joins Captain Pierre Lacroix and his crew composed by the First Officer Anna Lindbergh; Communication Officer Miyuki Yoshida and Igor Prokoff and Claudio Vespucci. The Sky Marshall Samuel Decker joins the team since the terrorist group Luddites, led by Klaus Bruckner, is bombing the stations. Lacroix organizes shifts of eight and half months for each crew-member while the others rest in cryogenic sleep. Three years and eight months later, Laura finds that there is apparently a stowaway in the cargo compartments and Decker and Lacroix are awakened to ...
movies.simplePlot: In 2270, Earth is completely depleted and no one lives there anymore. Those that have money move to Rhea; but most of the population lives in orbit in space stations. Dr. Laura Portmann ...

biography.bio: Anna Katharina Schwabroh was born in 1979 in Hamburg, Germany. She is an actress, known for Cargo (2009), Notruf Hafenkante (2007) and Tatort (1970).
biography.name: Anna Katharina Schwabroh

biography.bio: Martin Rapold was born on August 23, 1973 in Schaffhausen, Switzerland. He is an actor and writer, known for Cargo (2009), Exklusiv (1999) and Nebelgrind (2012).
biography.name: Martin Rapold

biography.bio: Regula Grauwiller was born on December 10, 1970 in Liestal BL, Switzerland. She is an actress, known for Cargo (2009), Short Sharp Shock (1998) and Cascadeur (1998). She is married to Jophi Ries. They have three children.
biography.name: Regula Grauwiller

biography.bio: Yangzom was born and raised in Bern, the capital of Switzerland. Completing her studies in Europe's prestigious University of Theater and Music in Bern, she started working in independent theater projects in Switzerland and Germany. Shortly thereafter, she was cast and guest-starred in a well-known Swiss sitcom 'Manne Zimmer' for National Swiss Television Network. Yangzom's career would take off establishing her as a well-known actress starring in many Swiss and German TV Shows as well as in movies such as 'Cargo', the first Swiss sci-fi movie and 'Laenger Leben', a Swiss Comedy. She received her Hollywood breakthrough when she won the role of "Inari" in the Sci Fi film, Aeon Flux, starring Charlize Theron. She then decided to move to Los Angeles to pursue her acting career in the States. In 2008 she wrote her first book, which became an instant bestseller in Germany and Switzerland 2009-10. 'Across Many Mountains' is a memoir about three generations of Tibetan women: Yangzom's grandmother, her mother and her own story. The book has sold over 500,000 copies in Germany and Switzerland, and was on Europe's Spiegel Bestseller list for over 40 weeks. 'Across Many Mountains' got published in March 2011 in England and Australia with Random House UK. The North American publishers of the book are St.Martin's Press in New York and in France, Press de la cite. The book has been published in 11 languages so far. With her latest short film "Born in Battle" about child soldiers she received the well known CICT-UNESCO Enrico Fulchignoni Award as well as the UNESCO Gandhi Medal at the Fribourg Film Festival. "Born in Battle" was shown during the UN committee meeting in Geneva with UN Special representative on children and armed conflict. The Short won the audience award at the prestigious Max Ophüls Preis 2016, a leading festival in the European film festival world for new emerging talents.
biography.name: Yangzom Brauen

biography.bio: Pierre Semmler was born on April 19, 1943 in Gladbeck, Germany. He was an actor, known for Cargo (2009), The Big Blue (1988) and A Simple Story (1978). He died on September 9, 2011 in Germany.
biography.name: Pierre Semmler

biography.bio: Claude-Oliver Rudolph was born on November 30, 1956 in Frankfurt/Main, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Das Boot (1981), The World Is Not Enough (1999) and Cargo (2009). He was previously married to Sabine von Maydell.
biography.name: Claude-Oliver Rudolph

biography.bio: Michael Finger was born in 1975 in Zurich, Switzerland. He is an actor and director, known for Cargo (2009), Tod eines Keilers (2006) and Her Second Chance (2006).
biography.name: Michael Finger

biography.bio: Gilles Tschudi was born in 1957 in Switzerland. He is an actor and writer, known for Sils Maria (2014), Cargo (2009) and Romeos (2011).
biography.name: Gilles Tschudi

biography.bio: Maria Boettner was born in 1978 in Germany. She is an actress, known for Cargo (2009), Monsieur Du Lit (2011) and Nach der Hochzeit bin ich weg! (2011).
biography.name: Maria Boettner

biography.bio: Noa Strupler is an actress, known for Cargo (2009).
biography.name: Noa Strupler

biography.bio: Diego Studer is an actor, known for Cargo (2009).
biography.name: Diego Studer

biography.bio: Vanessa Studer is an actress, known for Cargo (2009).
biography.name: Vanessa Studer

biography.bio: Christina was born in North Caucasus in Novoaleksandrovsk, she moved with is mother to South France in Hyere in 1994. In 1999 she moved to Paris and starts modeling. In 2003 she moved with her future husband in Switzerland in Lausanne. She has two children, Mila (2011) and Evan (2014). She has put her career aside but she appeared recently in some TV commercials.
biography.name: Christina Tchernychova

biography.bio: Roger Kaufmann is an actor and producer, known for Cargo (2009), Snow White (2005) and Overbooked (2012).
biography.name: Roger Kaufmann

biography.bio: Roman Güttinger is an actor and director, known for Cargo (2009), Temptation (2001) and Spider-Man (2002).
biography.name: Roman Güttinger

laboratory: Egli Film & Video AG, Zürich, Switzerland
